name: Tic Tac Toe
desc: Interactive Tic Tac Toe game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features player vs player mode with win detection and score tracking.

name: To Do List
desc: Modern task management application with add, edit, delete, and mark complete functionality. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with local storage support.

name: Recipe Book
desc: Comprehensive recipe management system where users can browse, search, and save their favorite recipes. Built with modern web technologies.

name: Catering Management
desc: Full-featured catering management system for managing orders, menus, customer details, and event bookings. Streamlines catering business operations.

name: Hospital Management
desc: Complete hospital management system with patient registration, appointment scheduling, doctor management, and medical records tracking.
